original_text: And as for the cities that you shall give from the possession of the people of Israel, from the larger tribes you shall take many, and from the smaller tribes you shall take few; each, in proportion to the inheritance that it inherits, shall give of its cities to the Levites.”
korean_text: 너희가 이스라엘 자손의 소유에서 레위인에게 너희가 성읍을 줄 때에 많이 받은 자에게서는 많이 떼어서 주고 적게 받은 자에게서는 적게 떼어 줄 것이라 각기 받은 기업을 따라서 그 성읍들을 레위인에게 줄지니라

sentences.original_text: from the possession of the people of Israel
from the larger tribes you shall take many
and from the smaller tribes you shall take few
shall give of its cities to the Levites
sentences.korean_translation: 그 도시들을 레위 사람에게 주어야 할 것이다
